data.title: Medical Aid For South Africa
meta_keywords: medical aid plan in South Africa
data.meta_description: A medical aid plan for everybody in South Africa, with cover for day-to-day medical expenses and private hospital cover with no overall limit.
data.text:
Medical aid cover for everybody in South Africa

With Medihelp, you can be assured of best-in-class medical aid plans and exceptional support services to help you make informed decisions about your healthcare cover. With more than a century in the medical aid industry, we have the experience to maintain the stability and sustainability needed to ensure our members’ peace of mind – whether you are an individual, a student, part of a family, or a business owner.

We lead

We are one of the largest medical aids in South Africa and with 118 years’ experience as our foundation, we have a clear understanding of what matters and how to provide the healthcare cover and care that members need.
